name: My Heroes: SEA
storyline: The game is centered on the pursuit of refreshing and exciting barrage shooting battles, with a high degree of freedom and strategic Diablo-style building and development gameplay, creating an interesting pixel adventure world for players.
summary: My Heroes is a classic pixel-style barrage shooting ARPG game that players can freely team up for adventure. The game is centered on the pursuit of refreshing and exciting barrage shooting battles, with a high degree of freedom and strategic Diablo-style building and development gameplay, creating an interesting pixel adventure world for players.
